title: TigerDad Mobile Adjustable Height Laptop Stand PC Computer Portable Notebook Swivel Laptop Desk Rolling Table Desk Cart Tiltable with Wheels Casters& Mouse Pad Table (Dekuwood)
description: Made of high quality and sturdy materials E1 grade MDF board, size perfect fit almost all types laptop, less likely to wobble and sturdy enough to supports up to 44 lbs of evenly distributed weight. Featuring a safety edge stopper,. . The modern stylish look can fit in well with any decor in your house, dorm or office.

1.Adjustable overbed table:You can easily adjust the overbed laptop table at any angle or height you want and locks firmly in position.So that the tiltable bedside table can provide you a more comfortable position.

2.Safety rolling laptop desk:The rolling bedside table can safely hold your laptop with safety edge stopper, can safely hold your laptop or other objects and keep them from sliding off when the panel is tilted

3.Mobile computer desk: The mobile laptop desk with wheels to move around or lock in your convinience,4 lockable rolling casters make it easy for the workstation to be mobile/ still-standing.It is easy to drive overbed table with wheels.

4.Versatile use:You can use it overbed bedside table,rolling computer desk,TV trays for bed,over bed table with wheels.Professional design,single pole under steel frame,you can freely stretch legs of the overbed tables with wheels.
5.Top quality material for safe using:E1 grade table top which is water proof,welded metal base frame provides you with sturdy over bed desk.
Material:15mm thick E1 grade MDF panel with thicker metal frame
Table size :15*12inches of main table,and 8*12 inches of mouse pad table
Wheels: 4x1 inch casters with stop plug
Assembly Required: Yes.With tools and intallation instruction included
